name: Super Tank Online - Living In The Battle
name_original: Super Tank Online - Living In The Battle
description:
SuperTank online - play game online with thousands of people around the world.
- Very simple game play, just tap anywhere to fight.
- Choose your own tank color.
- Level system according to military standards.
- Increase every 3 levels to transform your tank with new strenngth.
- Get total 1000 kills to find surprises
